override

  • Empty the kicked session set
145{
147 while (!_sessions.empty())
148 {
149 // not remove from queue, prevent loading new sessions
150 delete _sessions.begin()->second;
151 _sessions.erase(_sessions.begin());
152 }
153
154 while (!_offlineSessions.empty())
155 {
156 delete _offlineSessions.begin()->second;

158 }

Member Function Documentation

◆ _UpdateGameTime()

void World::_UpdateGameTime ( )
protected

Update the game time.

  • update the time
  • if there is a shutdown timer
  • ... and it is overdue, stop the world (set m_stopEvent)
  • ... else decrease it and if necessary display a shutdown countdown to the users
2660{
2662 Seconds lastGameTime = GameTime::GetGameTime();
2663 GameTime::UpdateGameTimers();
2664
2665 Seconds elapsed = GameTime::GetGameTime() - lastGameTime;
2666
2668 if (!IsStopped() && _shutdownTimer > 0 && elapsed > 0s)
2669 {
2671 if (_shutdownTimer <= elapsed.count())
2672 {
2673 if (!(_shutdownMask & SHUTDOWN_MASK_IDLE) || GetActiveAndQueuedSessionCount() == 0)
2674 _stopEvent = true; // exist code already set
2675 else
2676 _shutdownTimer = 1; // minimum timer value to wait idle state
2677 }
2679 else
2680 {
2681 _shutdownTimer -= elapsed.count();
2682
2683 ShutdownMsg();
2684 }
2685 }
2686}
Seconds
std::chrono::seconds Seconds
Seconds shorthand typedef.
Definition: Duration.h:30
SHUTDOWN_MASK_IDLE
@ SHUTDOWN_MASK_IDLE
Definition: World.h:48

void UpdateGameTimers()
Update all timers.
Definition: GameTime.cpp:63

◆ _UpdateRealmCharCount()

void World::_UpdateRealmCharCount ( PreparedQueryResult  resultCharCount)
protected
2905{
2906 if (resultCharCount)
2907 {
2908 Field* fields = resultCharCount->Fetch();
2909 uint32 accountId = fields[0].Get<uint32>();
2910 uint8 charCount = uint8(fields[1].Get<uint64>());
2911
2912 LoginDatabaseTransaction trans = LoginDatabase.BeginTransaction();
2913
2914 LoginDatabasePreparedStatement* stmt = LoginDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(LOGIN_REP_REALM_CHARACTERS);
2915 stmt->SetData(0, charCount);
2916 stmt->SetData(1, accountId);
2917 stmt->SetData(2, realm.Id.Realm);
2918 trans->Append(stmt);
2919
2920 LoginDatabase.CommitTransaction(trans);
2921 }
2922}

private
264{
265 ASSERT (s);
266
267 // kick existing session with same account (if any)
268 // if character on old session is being loaded, then return
269 if (!KickSession(s->GetAccountId()))
270 {
271 s->KickPlayer("kick existing session with same account");
272 delete s; // session not added yet in session list, so not listed in queue
273 return;
274 }
275
276 SessionMap::const_iterator old = _sessions.find(s->GetAccountId());
277 if (old != _sessions.end())
278 {
279 WorldSession* oldSession = old->second;
280
281 if (!RemoveQueuedPlayer(oldSession) && getIntConfig(CONFIG_INTERVAL_DISCONNECT_TOLERANCE))
282 _disconnects[s->GetAccountId()] = GameTime::GetGameTime().count();
283
284 // pussywizard:
285 if (oldSession->HandleSocketClosed())
286 {
287 // there should be no offline session if current one is logged onto a character
288 SessionMap::iterator iter;
289 if ((iter = _offlineSessions.find(oldSession->GetAccountId())) != _offlineSessions.end())
290 {
291 WorldSession* tmp = iter->second;
292 _offlineSessions.erase(iter);
293 delete tmp;
294 }
295 oldSession->SetOfflineTime(GameTime::GetGameTime().count());
296 _offlineSessions[oldSession->GetAccountId()] = oldSession;
297 }
298 else
299 {
300 delete oldSession;
301 }
302 }
303
304 _sessions[s->GetAccountId()] = s;
305
306 uint32 Sessions = GetActiveAndQueuedSessionCount();
307 uint32 pLimit = GetPlayerAmountLimit();
308
309 // don't count this session when checking player limit
310 --Sessions;
311
312 if (pLimit > 0 && Sessions >= pLimit && AccountMgr::IsPlayerAccount(s->GetSecurity()) && !s->CanSkipQueue() && !HasRecentlyDisconnected(s))
313 {
314 AddQueuedPlayer(s);
315 UpdateMaxSessionCounters();
316 return;
317 }
318
319 s->InitializeSession();
320
321 UpdateMaxSessionCounters();
322}
ASSERT
#define ASSERT
Definition: Errors.h:68

@ CONFIG_INTERVAL_DISCONNECT_TOLERANCE

◆ DetectDBCLang()

void World::DetectDBCLang ( )
private
2217{
2218 uint8 m_lang_confid = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("DBC.Locale", 255);
2219
2220 if (m_lang_confid != 255 && m_lang_confid >= TOTAL_LOCALES)
2221 {
2222 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Incorrect DBC.Locale! Must be >= 0 and < {} (set to 0)", TOTAL_LOCALES);
2223 m_lang_confid = LOCALE_enUS;
2224 }
2225
2226 ChrRacesEntry const* race = sChrRacesStore.LookupEntry(1);
2227 std::string availableLocalsStr;
2228
2229 uint8 default_locale = TOTAL_LOCALES;
2230 for (uint8 i = default_locale - 1; i < TOTAL_LOCALES; --i) // -1 will be 255 due to uint8
2231 {
2232 if (race->name[i][0] != '\0') // check by race names
2233 {
2234 default_locale = i;
2235 _availableDbcLocaleMask |= (1 << i);
2236 availableLocalsStr += localeNames[i];
2237 availableLocalsStr += " ";
2238 }
2239 }
2240
2241 if (default_locale != m_lang_confid && m_lang_confid < TOTAL_LOCALES &&
2242 (_availableDbcLocaleMask & (1 << m_lang_confid)))
2243 {
2244 default_locale = m_lang_confid;
2245 }
2246
2247 if (default_locale >= TOTAL_LOCALES)
2248 {
2249 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Unable to determine your DBC Locale! (corrupt DBC?)");
2250 exit(1);
2251 }
2252
2253 _defaultDbcLocale = LocaleConstant(default_locale);
2254
2255 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Using {} DBC Locale As Default. All Available DBC locales: {}", localeNames[GetDefaultDbcLocale()], availableLocalsStr.empty() ? "<none>" : availableLocalsStr);
2256 LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
2257}

178{
180 SessionMap::const_iterator itr;

◆ HasRecentlyDisconnected()

bool World::HasRecentlyDisconnected ( WorldSession *  session)
overridevirtual

Implements IWorld.

325{
326 if (!session)
327 return false;
328
329 if (uint32 tolerance = getIntConfig(CONFIG_INTERVAL_DISCONNECT_TOLERANCE))
330 {
331 for (DisconnectMap::iterator i = _disconnects.begin(); i != _disconnects.end();)
332 {
333 if ((GameTime::GetGameTime().count() - i->second) < tolerance)
334 {
335 if (i->first == session->GetAccountId())
336 return true;
337 ++i;
338 }
339 else
340 _disconnects.erase(i++);
341 }
342 }
343 return false;
344}

References _disconnects, CONFIG_INTERVAL_DISCONNECT_TOLERANCE, WorldSession::GetAccountId(), GameTime::GetGameTime(), and getIntConfig().

Referenced by AddSession_().

2982 _nextGuildReset = wstime > 0s ? wstime : Seconds(Acore::Time::GetNextTimeWithDayAndHour(-1, 6));
2983

2986 sWorld->setWorldState(WS_GUILD_DAILY_RESET_TIME, _nextGuildReset.count());

◆ KickAll()

void World::KickAll ( )
overridevirtual

Kick (and save) all players.

Implements IWorld.

2637{
2638 _queuedPlayer.clear(); // prevent send queue update packet and login queued sessions
2639
2640 // session not removed at kick and will removed in next update tick
2641 for (SessionMap::const_iterator itr = _sessions.begin(); itr != _sessions.end(); ++itr)
2642 itr->second->KickPlayer("KickAll sessions");
2643
2644 // pussywizard: kick offline sessions
2645 for (SessionMap::const_iterator itr = _offlineSessions.begin(); itr != _offlineSessions.end(); ++itr)
2646 itr->second->KickPlayer("KickAll offline sessions");
2647}

◆ KickAllLess()

void World::KickAllLess ( AccountTypes  sec)
overridevirtual

Kick (and save) all players with security level less sec

Implements IWorld.

2651{
2652 // session not removed at kick and will removed in next update tick
2653 for (SessionMap::const_iterator itr = _sessions.begin(); itr != _sessions.end(); ++itr)
2654 if (itr->second->GetSecurity() < sec)
2655 itr->second->KickPlayer("KickAllLess");

◆ KickSession()

bool World::KickSession ( uint32  id)
overridevirtual

Remove a given session.

  • Find the session, kick the user, but we can't delete session at this moment to prevent iterator invalidation

Implements IWorld.

243{
245 SessionMap::const_iterator itr = _sessions.find(id);
246
247 if (itr != _sessions.end() && itr->second)
248 {
249 if (itr->second->PlayerLoading())
250 return false;
251
252 itr->second->KickPlayer("KickSession", false);
253 }
254
255 return true;
256}

References _sessions.

◆ LoadConfigSettings()

void World::LoadConfigSettings ( bool  reload = false)
overridevirtual

Initialize config values.

  • Read the player limit and the Message of the day from the config file
  • Read ticket system setting from the config file
  • Get string for new logins (newly created characters)
  • Send server info on login?
  • Read all rates from the config file

  • Read other configuration items from the config file

    Todo:
    Add MonsterSight in worldserver.conf or put it as define
  • Load the CharDelete related config options
  • Load the ItemDelete related config options
  • Read the "Data" directory from the config file

Implements IWorld.

416{
417 if (reload)
418 {
419 if (!sConfigMgr->Reload())
420 {
421 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "World settings reload fail: can't read settings.");

592 _rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_ON_DEATH] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<float>("DurabilityLoss.OnDeath", 10.0f);
593 if (_rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_ON_DEATH] < 0.0f)
594 {
595 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "DurabilityLoss.OnDeath ({}) must be >=0. Using 0.0 instead.", _rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_ON_DEATH]);
596 _rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_ON_DEATH] = 0.0f;
597 }
598 if (_rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_ON_DEATH] > 100.0f)
599 {
600 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "DurabilityLoss.OnDeath ({}) must be <= 100. Using 100.0 instead.", _rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_ON_DEATH]);
601 _rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_ON_DEATH] = 0.0f;
602 }
603 _rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_ON_DEATH] = _rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_ON_DEATH] / 100.0f;
604
605 _rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_DAMAGE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<float>("DurabilityLossChance.Damage", 0.5f);
606 if (_rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_DAMAGE] < 0.0f)
607 {
608 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "DurabilityLossChance.Damage ({}) must be >=0. Using 0.0 instead.", _rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_DAMAGE]);
609 _rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_DAMAGE] = 0.0f;
610 }
611 _rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_ABSORB] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<float>("DurabilityLossChance.Absorb", 0.5f);
612 if (_rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_ABSORB] < 0.0f)
613 {
614 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "DurabilityLossChance.Absorb ({}) must be >=0. Using 0.0 instead.", _rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_ABSORB]);
615 _rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_ABSORB] = 0.0f;
616 }
617 _rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_PARRY] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<float>("DurabilityLossChance.Parry", 0.05f);
618 if (_rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_PARRY] < 0.0f)
619 {
620 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "DurabilityLossChance.Parry ({}) must be >=0. Using 0.0 instead.", _rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_PARRY]);
621 _rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_PARRY] = 0.0f;
622 }
623 _rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_BLOCK] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<float>("DurabilityLossChance.Block", 0.05f);
624 if (_rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_BLOCK] < 0.0f)
625 {
626 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "DurabilityLossChance.Block ({}) must be >=0. Using 0.0 instead.", _rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_BLOCK]);
627 _rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_BLOCK] = 0.0f;
628 }
629
631
632 _bool_configs[CONFIG_DURABILITY_LOSS_IN_PVP] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("DurabilityLoss.InPvP", false);
633
634 _int_configs[CONFIG_COMPRESSION] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("Compression", 1);
635 if (_int_configs[CONFIG_COMPRESSION] < 1 || _int_configs[CONFIG_COMPRESSION] > 9)
636 {
637 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Compression level ({}) must be in range 1..9. Using default compression level (1).", _int_configs[CONFIG_COMPRESSION]);
638 _int_configs[CONFIG_COMPRESSION] = 1;
639 }
640 _bool_configs[CONFIG_ADDON_CHANNEL] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("AddonChannel", true);
641 _bool_configs[CONFIG_CLEAN_CHARACTER_DB] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("CleanCharacterDB", false);
642 _int_configs[CONFIG_PERSISTENT_CHARACTER_CLEAN_FLAGS] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("PersistentCharacterCleanFlags", 0);
643 _int_configs[CONFIG_CHAT_CHANNEL_LEVEL_REQ] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("ChatLevelReq.Channel", 1);
644 _int_configs[CONFIG_CHAT_WHISPER_LEVEL_REQ] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("ChatLevelReq.Whisper", 1);
645 _int_configs[CONFIG_CHAT_SAY_LEVEL_REQ] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("ChatLevelReq.Say", 1);
646 _int_configs[CONFIG_PARTY_LEVEL_REQ] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("PartyLevelReq", 1);
647 _int_configs[CONFIG_TRADE_LEVEL_REQ] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("LevelReq.Trade", 1);
648 _int_configs[CONFIG_TICKET_LEVEL_REQ] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("LevelReq.Ticket", 1);
649 _int_configs[CONFIG_AUCTION_LEVEL_REQ] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("LevelReq.Auction", 1);
650 _int_configs[CONFIG_MAIL_LEVEL_REQ] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("LevelReq.Mail", 1);
651 _bool_configs[CONFIG_ALLOW_PLAYER_COMMANDS] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("AllowPlayerCommands", 1);
652 _bool_configs[CONFIG_PRESERVE_CUSTOM_CHANNELS] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("PreserveCustomChannels", false);
653 _int_configs[CONFIG_PRESERVE_CUSTOM_CHANNEL_DURATION] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("PreserveCustomChannelDuration", 14);
654 _int_configs[CONFIG_INTERVAL_SAVE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("PlayerSaveInterval", 15 * MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS);
655 _int_configs[CONFIG_INTERVAL_DISCONNECT_TOLERANCE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("DisconnectToleranceInterval", 0);
656 _bool_configs[CONFIG_STATS_SAVE_ONLY_ON_LOGOUT] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("PlayerSave.Stats.SaveOnlyOnLogout", true);
657
658 _int_configs[CONFIG_MIN_LEVEL_STAT_SAVE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("PlayerSave.Stats.MinLevel", 0);
659 if (_int_configs[CONFIG_MIN_LEVEL_STAT_SAVE] > MAX_LEVEL || int32(_int_configs[CONFIG_MIN_LEVEL_STAT_SAVE]) < 0)
660 {
661 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "PlayerSave.Stats.MinLevel ({}) must be in range 0..80. Using default, do not save character stats (0).", _int_configs[CONFIG_MIN_LEVEL_STAT_SAVE]);
662 _int_configs[CONFIG_MIN_LEVEL_STAT_SAVE] = 0;
663 }
664
665 _int_configs[CONFIG_INTERVAL_MAPUPDATE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("MapUpdateInterval", 10);
666 if (_int_configs[CONFIG_INTERVAL_MAPUPDATE] < MIN_MAP_UPDATE_DELAY)
667 {
668 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "MapUpdateInterval ({}) must be greater {}. Use this minimal value.", _int_configs[CONFIG_INTERVAL_MAPUPDATE], MIN_MAP_UPDATE_DELAY);
669 _int_configs[CONFIG_INTERVAL_MAPUPDATE] = MIN_MAP_UPDATE_DELAY;
670 }
671 if (reload)
672 sMapMgr->SetMapUpdateInterval(_int_configs[CONFIG_INTERVAL_MAPUPDATE]);
673

678 uint32 val = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("WorldServerPort", 8085);
679 if (val != _int_configs[CONFIG_PORT_WORLD])

906 if (_int_configs[CONFIG_MIN_PETITION_SIGNS] > 9 || int32(_int_configs[CONFIG_MIN_PETITION_SIGNS]) < 0)
907 {
908 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "MinPetitionSigns ({}) must be in range 0..9. Set to 9.", _int_configs[CONFIG_MIN_PETITION_SIGNS]);
909 _int_configs[CONFIG_MIN_PETITION_SIGNS] = 9;
910 }
911
912 _int_configs[CONFIG_GM_LOGIN_STATE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("GM.LoginState", 2);
913 _int_configs[CONFIG_GM_VISIBLE_STATE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("GM.Visible", 2);
914 _int_configs[CONFIG_GM_CHAT] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("GM.Chat", 2);
915 _int_configs[CONFIG_GM_WHISPERING_TO] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("GM.WhisperingTo", 2);
916
917 _int_configs[CONFIG_GM_LEVEL_IN_GM_LIST] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("GM.InGMList.Level", SEC_ADMINISTRATOR);
918 _int_configs[CONFIG_GM_LEVEL_IN_WHO_LIST] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("GM.InWhoList.Level", SEC_ADMINISTRATOR);
919 _int_configs[CONFIG_START_GM_LEVEL] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("GM.StartLevel", 1);
920 if (_int_configs[CONFIG_START_GM_LEVEL] < _int_configs[CONFIG_START_PLAYER_LEVEL])
921 {
922 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "GM.StartLevel ({}) must be in range StartPlayerLevel({})..{}. Set to {}.",
923 _int_configs[CONFIG_START_GM_LEVEL], _int_configs[CONFIG_START_PLAYER_LEVEL], MAX_LEVEL, _int_configs[CONFIG_START_PLAYER_LEVEL]);
924 _int_configs[CONFIG_START_GM_LEVEL] = _int_configs[CONFIG_START_PLAYER_LEVEL];
925 }
926 else if (_int_configs[CONFIG_START_GM_LEVEL] > MAX_LEVEL)
927 {
928 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "GM.StartLevel ({}) must be in range 1..{}. Set to {}.", _int_configs[CONFIG_START_GM_LEVEL], MAX_LEVEL, MAX_LEVEL);
929 _int_configs[CONFIG_START_GM_LEVEL] = MAX_LEVEL;
930 }
931 _bool_configs[CONFIG_ALLOW_GM_GROUP] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("GM.AllowInvite", false);
932 _bool_configs[CONFIG_ALLOW_GM_FRIEND] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("GM.AllowFriend", false);
933 _bool_configs[CONFIG_GM_LOWER_SECURITY] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("GM.LowerSecurity", false);
934 _float_configs[CONFIG_CHANCE_OF_GM_SURVEY] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<float>("GM.TicketSystem.ChanceOfGMSurvey", 50.0f);
935
936 _int_configs[CONFIG_GROUP_VISIBILITY] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("Visibility.GroupMode", 1);
937

940 _bool_configs[CONFIG_LOW_LEVEL_REGEN_BOOST] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("EnableLowLevelRegenBoost", true);

944 _int_configs[CONFIG_MAIL_DELIVERY_DELAY] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("MailDeliveryDelay", HOUR);
945
946 _int_configs[CONFIG_UPTIME_UPDATE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("UpdateUptimeInterval", 10);
947 if (int32(_int_configs[CONFIG_UPTIME_UPDATE]) <= 0)
948 {
949 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "UpdateUptimeInterval ({}) must be > 0, set to default 10.", _int_configs[CONFIG_UPTIME_UPDATE]);
950 _int_configs[CONFIG_UPTIME_UPDATE] = 1;
951 }
952
953 if (reload)
954 {
955 _timers[WUPDATE_UPTIME].SetInterval(_int_configs[CONFIG_UPTIME_UPDATE]*MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS);
956 _timers[WUPDATE_UPTIME].Reset();
957 }
958
959 // log db cleanup interval
960 _int_configs[CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARINTERVAL] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("LogDB.Opt.ClearInterval", 10);
961 if (int32(_int_configs[CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARINTERVAL]) <= 0)
962 {
963 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "LogDB.Opt.ClearInterval ({}) must be > 0, set to default 10.", _int_configs[CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARINTERVAL]);
964 _int_configs[CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARINTERVAL] = 10;
965 }
966 if (reload)
967 {
968 _timers[WUPDATE_CLEANDB].SetInterval(_int_configs[CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARINTERVAL] * MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS);
969 _timers[WUPDATE_CLEANDB].Reset();
970 }

972 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Will clear `logs` table of entries older than {} seconds every {} minutes.",
973 _int_configs[CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARTIME], _int_configs[CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARINTERVAL]);

1170 _int_configs[CONFIG_ARENA_RATING_DISCARD_TIMER] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<uint32>("Arena.RatingDiscardTimer", 10 * MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS);
1171 _int_configs[CONFIG_ARENA_PREV_OPPONENTS_DISCARD_TIMER] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<uint32>("Arena.PreviousOpponentsDiscardTimer", 2 * MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS);
1172 _bool_configs[CONFIG_ARENA_AUTO_DISTRIBUTE_POINTS] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("Arena.AutoDistributePoints", false);
1173 _int_configs[CONFIG_ARENA_AUTO_DISTRIBUTE_INTERVAL_DAYS] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<uint32>("Arena.AutoDistributeInterval", 7); // pussywizard: spoiled by implementing constant day and hour, always 7 now
1174 _int_configs[CONFIG_ARENA_GAMES_REQUIRED] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<uint32>("Arena.GamesRequired", 10);
1175 _int_configs[CONFIG_ARENA_SEASON_ID] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<uint32>("Arena.ArenaSeason.ID", 8);
1176 _int_configs[CONFIG_ARENA_START_RATING] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<uint32>("Arena.ArenaStartRating", 0);
1177 _int_configs[CONFIG_LEGACY_ARENA_POINTS_CALC] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<uint32>("Arena.LegacyArenaPoints", 0);
1178 _int_configs[CONFIG_ARENA_START_PERSONAL_RATING] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<uint32>("Arena.ArenaStartPersonalRating", 0);
1179 _int_configs[CONFIG_ARENA_START_MATCHMAKER_RATING] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<uint32>("Arena.ArenaStartMatchmakerRating", 1500);
1180 _bool_configs[CONFIG_ARENA_SEASON_IN_PROGRESS] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("Arena.ArenaSeason.InProgress", true);
1181 _float_configs[CONFIG_ARENA_WIN_RATING_MODIFIER_1] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<float>("Arena.ArenaWinRatingModifier1", 48.0f);
1182 _float_configs[CONFIG_ARENA_WIN_RATING_MODIFIER_2] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<float>("Arena.ArenaWinRatingModifier2", 24.0f);
1183 _float_configs[CONFIG_ARENA_LOSE_RATING_MODIFIER] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<float>("Arena.ArenaLoseRatingModifier", 24.0f);
1184 _float_configs[CONFIG_ARENA_MATCHMAKER_RATING_MODIFIER] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<float>("Arena.ArenaMatchmakerRatingModifier", 24.0f);

1186 _bool_configs[CONFIG_ARENA_QUEUE_ANNOUNCER_PLAYERONLY] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("Arena.QueueAnnouncer.PlayerOnly", false);
1187 _int_configs[CONFIG_ARENA_QUEUE_ANNOUNCER_DETAIL] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<uint32>("Arena.QueueAnnouncer.Detail", 3);
1188
1189 _bool_configs[CONFIG_OFFHAND_CHECK_AT_SPELL_UNLEARN] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("OffhandCheckAtSpellUnlearn", true);
1190 _int_configs[CONFIG_CREATURE_STOP_FOR_PLAYER] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<uint32>("Creature.MovingStopTimeForPlayer", 3 * MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS);
1191
1192 _int_configs[CONFIG_WATER_BREATH_TIMER] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<uint32>("WaterBreath.Timer", 180000);
1193 if (_int_configs[CONFIG_WATER_BREATH_TIMER] <= 0)
1194 {
1195 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "WaterBreath.Timer ({}) must be > 0. Using 180000 instead.", _int_configs[CONFIG_WATER_BREATH_TIMER]);
1196 _int_configs[CONFIG_WATER_BREATH_TIMER] = 180000;
1197 }
1198
1199 if (int32 clientCacheId = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("ClientCacheVersion", 0))
1200 {
1201 // overwrite DB/old value
1202 if (clientCacheId > 0)
1203 {
1204 _int_configs[CONFIG_CLIENTCACHE_VERSION] = clientCacheId;
1205 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Client cache version set to: {}", clientCacheId);
1206 }
1207 else
1208 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "ClientCacheVersion can't be negative {}, ignored.", clientCacheId);
1209 }
1210
1211 _int_configs[CONFIG_INSTANT_LOGOUT] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("InstantLogout", SEC_MODERATOR);
1212
1213 _int_configs[CONFIG_GUILD_EVENT_LOG_COUNT] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("Guild.EventLogRecordsCount", GUILD_EVENTLOG_MAX_RECORDS);
1214 if (_int_configs[CONFIG_GUILD_EVENT_LOG_COUNT] > GUILD_EVENTLOG_MAX_RECORDS)
1215 _int_configs[CONFIG_GUILD_EVENT_LOG_COUNT] = GUILD_EVENTLOG_MAX_RECORDS;
1216 _int_configs[CONFIG_GUILD_BANK_EVENT_LOG_COUNT] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("Guild.BankEventLogRecordsCount", GUILD_BANKLOG_MAX_RECORDS);
1217 if (_int_configs[CONFIG_GUILD_BANK_EVENT_LOG_COUNT] > GUILD_BANKLOG_MAX_RECORDS)
1218 _int_configs[CONFIG_GUILD_BANK_EVENT_LOG_COUNT] = GUILD_BANKLOG_MAX_RECORDS;
1219
1220 //visibility on continents
1221 _maxVisibleDistanceOnContinents = sConfigMgr->GetOption<float>("Visibility.Distance.Continents", DEFAULT_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE);
1222 if (_maxVisibleDistanceOnContinents < 45 * sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO))
1223 {
1224 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Visibility.Distance.Continents can't be less max aggro radius {}", 45 * sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO));
1225 _maxVisibleDistanceOnContinents = 45 * sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO);
1226 }
1227 else if (_maxVisibleDistanceOnContinents > MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE)
1228 {
1229 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Visibility.Distance.Continents can't be greater {}", MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE);
1230 _maxVisibleDistanceOnContinents = MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE;
1231 }
1232
1233 //visibility in instances
1234 _maxVisibleDistanceInInstances = sConfigMgr->GetOption<float>("Visibility.Distance.Instances", DEFAULT_VISIBILITY_INSTANCE);
1235 if (_maxVisibleDistanceInInstances < 45 * sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO))
1236 {
1237 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Visibility.Distance.Instances can't be less max aggro radius {}", 45 * sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO));
1238 _maxVisibleDistanceInInstances = 45 * sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO);
1239 }
1240 else if (_maxVisibleDistanceInInstances > MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE)
1241 {
1242 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Visibility.Distance.Instances can't be greater {}", MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE);
1243 _maxVisibleDistanceInInstances = MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE;
1244 }
1245
1246 //visibility in BG/Arenas
1247 _maxVisibleDistanceInBGArenas = sConfigMgr->GetOption<float>("Visibility.Distance.BGArenas", DEFAULT_VISIBILITY_BGARENAS);
1248 if (_maxVisibleDistanceInBGArenas < 45 * sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO))
1249 {
1250 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Visibility.Distance.BGArenas can't be less max aggro radius {}", 45 * sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO));
1251 _maxVisibleDistanceInBGArenas = 45 * sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO);
1252 }
1253 else if (_maxVisibleDistanceInBGArenas > MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE)
1254 {
1255 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Visibility.Distance.BGArenas can't be greater {}", MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE);
1256 _maxVisibleDistanceInBGArenas = MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE;
1257 }

1284

1286
1287 _bool_configs[CONFIG_MUNCHING_BLIZZLIKE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("MunchingBlizzlike.Enabled", true);
1288
1289 _bool_configs[CONFIG_ENABLE_DAZE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("Daze.Enabled", true);
1290
1291 _int_configs[CONFIG_DAILY_RBG_MIN_LEVEL_AP_REWARD] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<uint32>("DailyRBGArenaPoints.MinLevel", 71);

1293 _int_configs[CONFIG_AUCTION_HOUSE_SEARCH_TIMEOUT] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<uint32>("AuctionHouse.SearchTimeout", 1000);
1294
1296 std::string dataPath = sConfigMgr->GetOption<std::string>("DataDir", "./");
1297 if (dataPath.empty() || (dataPath.at(dataPath.length() - 1) != '/' && dataPath.at(dataPath.length() - 1) != '\\'))
1298 dataPath.push_back('/');
1299
1300#if AC_PLATFORM == AC_PLATFORM_UNIX || AC_PLATFORM == AC_PLATFORM_APPLE
1301 if (dataPath[0] == '~')
1302 {
1303 const char* home = getenv("HOME");
1304 if (home)
1305 dataPath.replace(0, 1, home);
1306 }
1307#endif
1308
1309 if (reload)
1310 {
1311 if (dataPath != _dataPath)
1312 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "DataDir option can't be changed at worldserver.conf reload, using current value ({}).", _dataPath);
1313 }
1314 else
1315 {
1316 _dataPath = dataPath;
1317 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Using DataDir {}", _dataPath);
1318 }
1319
1320 bool enableIndoor = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("vmap.enableIndoorCheck", true);
1321 _bool_configs[CONFIG_VMAP_INDOOR_CHECK] = enableIndoor;
1322 bool enableLOS = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("vmap.enableLOS", true);
1323 bool enableHeight = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("vmap.enableHeight", true);
1324 bool enablePetLOS = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("vmap.petLOS", true);
1325 _bool_configs[CONFIG_VMAP_BLIZZLIKE_PVP_LOS] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("vmap.BlizzlikePvPLOS", true);
1326 _bool_configs[CONFIG_VMAP_BLIZZLIKE_LOS_OPEN_WORLD] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("vmap.BlizzlikeLOSInOpenWorld", true);
1327
1328 if (!enableHeight)
1329 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "VMap height checking disabled! Creatures movements and other various things WILL be broken! Expect no support.");
1330
1331 VMAP::VMapFactory::createOrGetVMapMgr()->setEnableLineOfSightCalc(enableLOS);
1332 VMAP::VMapFactory::createOrGetVMapMgr()->setEnableHeightCalc(enableHeight);
1333 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "WORLD: VMap support included. LineOfSight:{}, getHeight:{}, indoorCheck:{} PetLOS:{}", enableLOS, enableHeight, enableIndoor, enablePetLOS);
1334
1335 _bool_configs[CONFIG_PET_LOS] = enablePetLOS;
1336 _bool_configs[CONFIG_START_CUSTOM_SPELLS] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("PlayerStart.CustomSpells", false);
1337 _int_configs[CONFIG_HONOR_AFTER_DUEL] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("HonorPointsAfterDuel", 0);
1338 _bool_configs[CONFIG_START_ALL_EXPLORED] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("PlayerStart.MapsExplored", false);
1339 _bool_configs[CONFIG_START_ALL_REP] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("PlayerStart.AllReputation", false);
1340 _bool_configs[CONFIG_ALWAYS_MAXSKILL] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("AlwaysMaxWeaponSkill", false);
1341 _bool_configs[CONFIG_PVP_TOKEN_ENABLE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("PvPToken.Enable", false);
1342 _int_configs[CONFIG_PVP_TOKEN_MAP_TYPE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("PvPToken.MapAllowType", 4);
1343 _int_configs[CONFIG_PVP_TOKEN_ID] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("PvPToken.ItemID", 29434);
1344 _int_configs[CONFIG_PVP_TOKEN_COUNT] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("PvPToken.ItemCount", 1);
1345 if (_int_configs[CONFIG_PVP_TOKEN_COUNT] < 1)
1346 _int_configs[CONFIG_PVP_TOKEN_COUNT] = 1;

1463 _bool_configs[CONFIG_DEBUG_ARENA] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("Debug.Arena", false);
1464
1465 _int_configs[CONFIG_GM_LEVEL_CHANNEL_MODERATION] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("Channel.ModerationGMLevel", 1);
1466
1467 _bool_configs[CONFIG_SET_BOP_ITEM_TRADEABLE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("Item.SetItemTradeable", true);
1468
1469 // Specifies if IP addresses can be logged to the database
1470 _bool_configs[CONFIG_ALLOW_LOGGING_IP_ADDRESSES_IN_DATABASE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("AllowLoggingIPAddressesInDatabase", true, true);
1471
1472 // LFG group mechanics.
1473 _int_configs[CONFIG_LFG_MAX_KICK_COUNT] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("LFG.MaxKickCount", 2);
1474 if (_int_configs[CONFIG_LFG_MAX_KICK_COUNT] > 3)
1475 {
1476 _int_configs[CONFIG_LFG_MAX_KICK_COUNT] = 3;
1477 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "LFG.MaxKickCount can't be higher than 3.");
1478 }
1479
1480 _int_configs[CONFIG_LFG_KICK_PREVENTION_TIMER] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("LFG.KickPreventionTimer", 15 * MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS) * IN_MILLISECONDS;
1481 if (_int_configs[CONFIG_LFG_KICK_PREVENTION_TIMER] > 15 * MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS)
1482 {
1483 _int_configs[CONFIG_LFG_KICK_PREVENTION_TIMER] = 15 * MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS;
1484 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "LFG.KickPreventionTimer can't be higher than 15 minutes.");
1485 }
1486
1487 // Realm Availability
1488 _bool_configs[CONFIG_REALM_LOGIN_ENABLED] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("World.RealmAvailability", true);
1489
1490 // call ScriptMgr if we're reloading the configuration
1491 sScriptMgr->OnAfterConfigLoad(reload);
1492}

void World::LoadWorldStates ( )

3136{
3137 uint32 oldMSTime = getMSTime();
3138
3139 QueryResult result = CharacterDatabase.Query("SELECT entry, value FROM worldstates");
3140
3141 if (!result)
3142 {
3143 LOG_WARN("server.loading", ">> Loaded 0 world states. DB table `worldstates` is empty!");
3144 LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
3145 return;
3146 }
3147
3148 do
3149 {
3150 Field* fields = result->Fetch();
3151 _worldstates[fields[0].Get<uint32>()] = fields[1].Get<uint32>();
3152 } while (result->NextRow());
3153
3154 LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded {} World States in {} ms", _worldstates.size(), GetMSTimeDiffToNow(oldMSTime));
3155 LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
3156}

◆ RemoveQueuedPlayer()

bool World::RemoveQueuedPlayer ( WorldSession *  session)
overridevirtual

Implements IWorld.

367{
368 uint32 sessions = GetActiveSessionCount();
369
370 uint32 position = 1;
371 Queue::iterator iter = _queuedPlayer.begin();
372
373 // search to remove and count skipped positions
374 bool found = false;
375
376 for (; iter != _queuedPlayer.end(); ++iter, ++position)
377 {
378 if (*iter == sess)
379 {
380 sess->SetInQueue(false);
381 sess->ResetTimeOutTime(false);
382 iter = _queuedPlayer.erase(iter);
383 found = true;
384 break;
385 }
386 }
387
388 // if session not queued then it was an active session
389 if (!found)
390 {
391 ASSERT(sessions > 0);
392 --sessions;
393 }
394
395 // accept first in queue
396 if ((!GetPlayerAmountLimit() || sessions < GetPlayerAmountLimit()) && !_queuedPlayer.empty())
397 {
398 WorldSession* pop_sess = _queuedPlayer.front();
399 pop_sess->InitializeSession();
400 _queuedPlayer.pop_front();
401
402 // update iter to point first queued socket or end() if queue is empty now
403 iter = _queuedPlayer.begin();
404 position = 1;
405 }
406
407 // update queue position from iter to end()
408 for (; iter != _queuedPlayer.end(); ++iter, ++position)
409 (*iter)->SendAuthWaitQueue(position);
410
411 return found;
412}
World::GetActiveSessionCount
uint32 GetActiveSessionCount() const override
Definition: World.h:168

References _queuedPlayer, ASSERT, GetActiveSessionCount(), GetPlayerAmountLimit(), WorldSession::InitializeSession(), WorldSession::ResetTimeOutTime(), and WorldSession::SetInQueue().

Referenced by AddSession_(), and UpdateSessions().

◆ SetInitialWorldSettings()

void World::SetInitialWorldSettings ( )
overridevirtual

Initialize the World.

  • Server startup begin
  • Initialize the random number generator
  • Initialize detour memory management
  • Initialize VMapMgr function pointers (to untangle game/collision circular deps)
  • Initialize config settings
  • Initialize Allowed Security Level
  • Init highest guids before any table loading to prevent using not initialized guids in some code.
  • Check the existence of the map files for all starting areas.
  • Initialize pool manager
  • Initialize game event manager
  • Loading strings. Getting no records means core load has to be canceled because no error message can be output.
  • Update the realm entry in the database with the realm type from the config file
  • Custom Hook for loading DB items
  • Load the DBC files
  • Initilize static helper structures
  • Load dynamic data tables from the database
  • Handle outdated emails (delete/return)
  • Load AutoBroadCast
  • Load Motd
  • Load and initialize scripts
  • Initialize game time and timers
  • Initialize MapMgr
  • Initialize Battlegrounds
  • Initialize outdoor pvp
  • Initialize Battlefield
  • Initialize Warden

Implements IWorld.

1496{
1498 uint32 startupBegin = getMSTime();
1499
1501 srand((unsigned int)GameTime::GetGameTime().count());
1502
1504 dtAllocSetCustom(dtCustomAlloc, dtCustomFree);
1505
1507 VMAP::VMapMgr2* vmmgr2 = VMAP::VMapFactory::createOrGetVMapMgr();
1508 vmmgr2->GetLiquidFlagsPtr = &GetLiquidFlags;
1509 vmmgr2->IsVMAPDisabledForPtr = &DisableMgr::IsVMAPDisabledFor;
1510
1512 LoadConfigSettings();
1513
1515 LoadDBAllowedSecurityLevel();
1516
1518 sObjectMgr->SetHighestGuids();
1519
1520 if (!sConfigMgr->isDryRun())
1521 {
1523 if (!MapMgr::ExistMapAndVMap(0, -6240.32f, 331.033f)
1524 || !MapMgr::ExistMapAndVMap(0, -8949.95f, -132.493f)
1525 || !MapMgr::ExistMapAndVMap(1, -618.518f, -4251.67f)
1526 || !MapMgr::ExistMapAndVMap(0, 1676.35f, 1677.45f)
1527 || !MapMgr::ExistMapAndVMap(1, 10311.3f, 832.463f)
1528 || !MapMgr::ExistMapAndVMap(1, -2917.58f, -257.98f)
1529 || (_int_configs[CONFIG_EXPANSION] && (
1530 !MapMgr::ExistMapAndVMap(530, 10349.6f, -6357.29f) ||
1531 !MapMgr::ExistMapAndVMap(530, -3961.64f, -13931.2f))))
1532 {
1533 exit(1);
1534 }
1535 }
1536

1544 LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
1545 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Loading Acore Strings...");
1546 if (!sObjectMgr->LoadAcoreStrings())
1547 exit(1); // Error message displayed in function already

1553
1555 //No SQL injection as values are treated as integers
1556
1557 // not send custom type REALM_FFA_PVP to realm list
1558 uint32 server_type;
1559 if (IsFFAPvPRealm())
1560 server_type = REALM_TYPE_PVP;
1561 else
1562 server_type = getIntConfig(CONFIG_GAME_TYPE);
1563
1564 uint32 realm_zone = getIntConfig(CONFIG_REALM_ZONE);
1565
1566 LoginDatabase.Execute("UPDATE realmlist SET icon = {}, timezone = {} WHERE id = '{}'", server_type, realm_zone, realm.Id.Realm); // One-time query

2005 // pussywizard:
2006 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Deleting Invalid Mail Items...");
2007 LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
2008 CharacterDatabase.Execute("DELETE mi FROM mail_items mi LEFT JOIN item_instance ii ON mi.item_guid = ii.guid WHERE ii.guid IS NULL");
2009 CharacterDatabase.Execute("DELETE mi FROM mail_items mi LEFT JOIN mail m ON mi.mail_id = m.id WHERE m.id IS NULL");
2010 CharacterDatabase.Execute("UPDATE mail m LEFT JOIN mail_items mi ON m.id = mi.mail_id SET m.has_items=0 WHERE m.has_items<>0 AND mi.mail_id IS NULL");

2062 LoginDatabasePreparedStatement* stmt = LoginDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(LOGIN_INS_UPTIME);
2063 stmt->SetData(0, realm.Id.Realm);
2064 stmt->SetData(1, uint32(GameTime::GetStartTime().count()));
2065 stmt->SetData(2, GitRevision::GetFullVersion());
2066 LoginDatabase.Execute(stmt);

2068 _timers[WUPDATE_WEATHERS].SetInterval(1 * IN_MILLISECONDS);
2069 _timers[WUPDATE_AUCTIONS].SetInterval(MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS);
2070 _timers[WUPDATE_AUCTIONS].SetCurrent(MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS);
2071 _timers[WUPDATE_UPTIME].SetInterval(_int_configs[CONFIG_UPTIME_UPDATE]*MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS);
2072 //Update "uptime" table based on configuration entry in minutes.
2073
2074 _timers[WUPDATE_CORPSES].SetInterval(20 * MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS);
2075 //erase corpses every 20 minutes
2076 _timers[WUPDATE_CLEANDB].SetInterval(_int_configs[CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARINTERVAL]*MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS);
2077 // clean logs table every 14 days by default
2078 _timers[WUPDATE_AUTOBROADCAST].SetInterval(getIntConfig(CONFIG_AUTOBROADCAST_INTERVAL));
2079
2080 _timers[WUPDATE_PINGDB].SetInterval(getIntConfig(CONFIG_DB_PING_INTERVAL)*MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS); // Mysql ping time in minutes
2081
2082 // our speed up
2083 _timers[WUPDATE_5_SECS].SetInterval(5 * IN_MILLISECONDS);
2084
2085 _timers[WUPDATE_WHO_LIST].SetInterval(5 * IN_MILLISECONDS); // update who list cache every 5 seconds
2086
2087 _mail_expire_check_timer = GameTime::GetGameTime() + 6h;

2141 LoginDatabase.Execute("DELETE FROM ip_banned WHERE unbandate <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP() AND unbandate<>bandate"); // One-time query

2157

2159 LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
2160 InitGuildResetTime();
2161

2163 sPetitionMgr->LoadPetitions();
2164

2175 ChannelMgr::LoadChannels();
2176
2177 sScriptMgr->OnBeforeWorldInitialized();
2178
2179 if (sWorld->getBoolConfig(CONFIG_PRELOAD_ALL_NON_INSTANCED_MAP_GRIDS))
2180 {
2181 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Loading All Grids For All Non-Instanced Maps...");
2182
2183 for (uint32 i = 0; i < sMapStore.GetNumRows(); ++i)
2184 {
2185 MapEntry const* mapEntry = sMapStore.LookupEntry(i);
2186
2187 if (mapEntry && !mapEntry->Instanceable())
2188 {
2189 Map* map = sMapMgr->CreateBaseMap(mapEntry->MapID);
2190
2191 if (map)
2192 {
2193 LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loading All Grids For Map {}", map->GetId());
2194 map->LoadAllCells();
2195 }
2196 }
2197 }
2198 }
2199
2200 uint32 startupDuration = GetMSTimeDiffToNow(startupBegin);
2201
2202 LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
2203 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "WORLD: World Initialized In {} Minutes {} Seconds", (startupDuration / 60000), ((startupDuration % 60000) / 1000)); // outError for red color in console
2204 LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
2205
2206 METRIC_EVENT("events", "World initialized", "World Initialized In " + std::to_string(startupDuration / 60000) + " Minutes " + std::to_string((startupDuration % 60000) / 1000) + " Seconds");
2207
2208 if (sConfigMgr->isDryRun())
2209 {
2210 sMapMgr->UnloadAll();
2211 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "AzerothCore Dry Run Completed, Terminating.");
2212 exit(0);
2213 }

◆ ShutdownCancel()

void World::ShutdownCancel ( )
overridevirtual

Cancel a planned server shutdown.

Implements IWorld.

2774{
2775 // nothing cancel or too later
2776 if (!_shutdownTimer || _stopEvent)
2777 return;
2778
2779 ServerMessageType msgid = (_shutdownMask & SHUTDOWN_MASK_RESTART) ? SERVER_MSG_RESTART_CANCELLED : SERVER_MSG_SHUTDOWN_CANCELLED;
2780
2781 _shutdownMask = 0;
2782 _shutdownTimer = 0;
2783 _exitCode = SHUTDOWN_EXIT_CODE; // to default value
2784 SendServerMessage(msgid);
2785
2786 LOG_DEBUG("server.worldserver", "Server {} cancelled.", (_shutdownMask & SHUTDOWN_MASK_RESTART ? "restart" : "shuttingdown"));
2787
2788 sScriptMgr->OnShutdownCancel();
2789}

◆ ShutdownMsg()

void World::ShutdownMsg ( bool  show = false,
Player *  player = nullptr,
const std::string &  reason = std::string() 
)
overridevirtual

Display a shutdown message to the user(s)

  • Display a message every 12 hours, hours, 5 minutes, minute, 5 seconds and finally seconds

Implements IWorld.

2745{
2746 // not show messages for idle shutdown mode
2747 if (_shutdownMask & SHUTDOWN_MASK_IDLE)
2748 return;
2749
2751 if (show ||
2752 (_shutdownTimer < 5 * MINUTE && (_shutdownTimer % 15) == 0) || // < 5 min; every 15 sec
2753 (_shutdownTimer < 15 * MINUTE && (_shutdownTimer % MINUTE) == 0) || // < 15 min ; every 1 min
2754 (_shutdownTimer < 30 * MINUTE && (_shutdownTimer % (5 * MINUTE)) == 0) || // < 30 min ; every 5 min
2755 (_shutdownTimer < 12 * HOUR && (_shutdownTimer % HOUR) == 0) || // < 12 h ; every 1 h
2756 (_shutdownTimer > 12 * HOUR && (_shutdownTimer % (12 * HOUR)) == 0)) // > 12 h ; every 12 h
2757 {
2758 std::string str = secsToTimeString(_shutdownTimer).append(".");
2759
2760 if (!reason.empty())
2761 {
2762 str += " - " + reason;
2763 }
2764
2765 ServerMessageType msgid = (_shutdownMask & SHUTDOWN_MASK_RESTART) ? SERVER_MSG_RESTART_TIME : SERVER_MSG_SHUTDOWN_TIME;
2766
2767 SendServerMessage(msgid, str, player);
2768 LOG_DEBUG("server.worldserver", "Server is {} in {}", (_shutdownMask & SHUTDOWN_MASK_RESTART ? "restart" : "shuttingdown"), str);
2769 }
2770}
secsToTimeString
std::string secsToTimeString(uint64 timeInSecs, bool shortText)
Definition: Util.cpp:73
SERVER_MSG_SHUTDOWN_TIME
@ SERVER_MSG_SHUTDOWN_TIME
Definition: IWorld.h:56
SERVER_MSG_RESTART_TIME
@ SERVER_MSG_RESTART_TIME
Definition: IWorld.h:57

References _shutdownMask, _shutdownTimer, HOUR, LOG_DEBUG, MINUTE, secsToTimeString(), SendServerMessage(), SERVER_MSG_RESTART_TIME, SERVER_MSG_SHUTDOWN_TIME, SHUTDOWN_MASK_IDLE, and SHUTDOWN_MASK_RESTART.

Referenced by _UpdateGameTime(), and ShutdownServ().

◆ ShutdownServ()

void World::ShutdownServ ( uint32  time,
uint32  options,
uint8  exitcode,
const std::string &  reason = std::string() 
)
overridevirtual

Shutdown the server.

  • If the shutdown time is 0, set m_stopEvent (except if shutdown is 'idle' with remaining sessions)
  • Else set the shutdown timer and warn users

Implements IWorld.

2690{
2691 // ignore if server shutdown at next tick
2692 if (IsStopped())
2693 return;
2694
2695 _shutdownMask = options;
2696 _exitCode = exitcode;
2697
2698 auto const& playersOnline = GetActiveSessionCount();
2699
2700 if (time < 5 && playersOnline)
2701 {
2702 // Set time to 5s for save all players
2703 time = 5;
2704 }
2705
2706 playersSaveScheduler.CancelAll();
2707
2708 if (time >= 5)
2709 {
2710 playersSaveScheduler.Schedule(Seconds(time - 5), [this](TaskContext /*context*/)
2711 {
2712 if (!GetActiveSessionCount())
2713 {
2714 LOG_INFO("server", "> No players online. Skip save before shutdown");
2715 return;
2716 }
2717
2718 LOG_INFO("server", "> Save players before shutdown server");
2719 ObjectAccessor::SaveAllPlayers();
2720 });
2721 }
2722
2723 LOG_WARN("server", "Time left until shutdown/restart: {}", time);
2724
2726 if (time == 0)
2727 {
2728 if (!(options & SHUTDOWN_MASK_IDLE) || GetActiveAndQueuedSessionCount() == 0)
2729 _stopEvent = true; // exist code already set
2730 else
2731 _shutdownTimer = 1; //So that the session count is re-evaluated at next world tick
2732 }
2734 else
2735 {
2736 _shutdownTimer = time;
2737 ShutdownMsg(true, nullptr, reason);
2738 }
2739
2740 sScriptMgr->OnShutdownInitiate(ShutdownExitCode(exitcode), ShutdownMask(options));
2741}
ShutdownExitCode
ShutdownExitCode
Definition: World.h:52
ShutdownMask
ShutdownMask
Definition: World.h:46
ObjectAccessor::SaveAllPlayers
void SaveAllPlayers()
Definition: ObjectAccessor.cpp:262
anonymous_namespace{World.cpp}::playersSaveScheduler
TaskScheduler playersSaveScheduler
Definition: World.cpp:101

TaskScheduler & CancelAll()
Definition: TaskScheduler.cpp:45

TaskScheduler & Schedule(std::chrono::duration< _Rep, _Period > const &time, task_handler_t const &task)
Definition: TaskScheduler.h:232
TaskContext
Definition: TaskScheduler.h:421

References _exitCode, _shutdownMask, _shutdownTimer, _stopEvent, TaskScheduler::CancelAll(), GetActiveAndQueuedSessionCount(), GetActiveSessionCount(), IsStopped(), LOG_INFO, LOG_WARN, ObjectAccessor::SaveAllPlayers(), TaskScheduler::Schedule(), SHUTDOWN_MASK_IDLE, ShutdownMsg(), and sScriptMgr.

◆ Update()

void World::Update ( uint32  diff)
overridevirtual

Update the World !

  • Update the game time and check for shutdown time
  • Update the different timers
  • Update Who List Cache

Handle daily quests reset time

Handle weekly quests reset time

Handle monthly quests reset time

Handle weather updates when the timer has passed

Clean logs table

  • Update objects when the timer has passed (maps, transport, creatures, ...)

Update uptime table

  • Erase corpses once every 20 minutes
  • Process Game events when necessary
  • Ping to keep MySQL connections alive

Implements IWorld.

2261{
2262 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time_total");
2263
2265 _UpdateGameTime();
2266 Seconds currentGameTime = GameTime::GetGameTime();
2267
2268 sWorldUpdateTime.UpdateWithDiff(diff);
2269
2270 // Record update if recording set in log and diff is greater then minimum set in log
2271 sWorldUpdateTime.RecordUpdateTime(GameTime::GetGameTimeMS(), diff, GetActiveSessionCount());
2272
2273 DynamicVisibilityMgr::Update(GetActiveSessionCount());
2274
2276 for (int i = 0; i < WUPDATE_COUNT; ++i)
2277 {
2278 if (_timers[i].GetCurrent() >= 0)
2279 _timers[i].Update(diff);
2280 else
2281 _timers[i].SetCurrent(0);
2282 }
2283
2284 // pussywizard: our speed up and functionality
2285 if (_timers[WUPDATE_5_SECS].Passed())
2286 {
2287 _timers[WUPDATE_5_SECS].Reset();
2288
2289 // moved here from HandleCharEnumOpcode
2290 CharacterDatabasePreparedStatement* stmt = CharacterDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(CHAR_DEL_EXPIRED_BANS);
2291 CharacterDatabase.Execute(stmt);
2292 }
2293
2295 if (_timers[WUPDATE_WHO_LIST].Passed())
2296 {
2297 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update who list"));
2298 _timers[WUPDATE_WHO_LIST].Reset();
2299 sWhoListCacheMgr->Update();
2300 }
2301
2302 {
2303 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Check quest reset times"));
2304
2306 if (currentGameTime > _nextDailyQuestReset)
2307 {
2308 ResetDailyQuests();
2309 }
2310
2312 if (currentGameTime > _nextWeeklyQuestReset)
2313 {
2314 ResetWeeklyQuests();
2315 }
2316
2318 if (currentGameTime > _nextMonthlyQuestReset)
2319 {
2320 ResetMonthlyQuests();
2321 }
2322 }
2323
2324 if (currentGameTime > _nextRandomBGReset)
2325 {
2326 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Reset random BG"));
2327 ResetRandomBG();
2328 }
2329
2330 if (currentGameTime > _nextCalendarOldEventsDeletionTime)
2331 {
2332 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Delete old calendar events"));
2333 CalendarDeleteOldEvents();
2334 }
2335
2336 if (currentGameTime > _nextGuildReset)
2337 {
2338 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Reset guild cap"));
2339 ResetGuildCap();
2340 }
2341
2342 // pussywizard: handle auctions when the timer has passed
2343 if (_timers[WUPDATE_AUCTIONS].Passed())
2344 {
2345 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update expired auctions"));
2346
2347 _timers[WUPDATE_AUCTIONS].Reset();
2348
2349 // pussywizard: handle expired auctions, auctions expired when realm was offline are also handled here (not during loading when many required things aren't loaded yet)
2350 sAuctionMgr->Update();
2351 }
2352
2353 AsyncAuctionListingMgr::Update(Milliseconds(diff));
2354
2355 if (currentGameTime > _mail_expire_check_timer)
2356 {
2357 sObjectMgr->ReturnOrDeleteOldMails(true);
2358 _mail_expire_check_timer = currentGameTime + 6h;
2359 }
2360
2361 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update sessions"));
2362 UpdateSessions(diff);
2363
2365 if (_timers[WUPDATE_WEATHERS].Passed())
2366 {
2367 _timers[WUPDATE_WEATHERS].Reset();
2368 WeatherMgr::Update(uint32(_timers[WUPDATE_WEATHERS].GetInterval()));
2369 }
2370
2372 if (sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARTIME) > 0) // if not enabled, ignore the timer
2373 {
2374 if (_timers[WUPDATE_CLEANDB].Passed())
2375 {
2376 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Clean logs table"));
2377
2378 _timers[WUPDATE_CLEANDB].Reset();
2379
2380 LoginDatabasePreparedStatement* stmt = LoginDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(LOGIN_DEL_OLD_LOGS);
2381 stmt->SetData(0, sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARTIME));
2382 stmt->SetData(1, uint32(currentGameTime.count()));
2383 LoginDatabase.Execute(stmt);
2384 }
2385 }
2386
2387 {
2388 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update LFG 0"));
2389 sLFGMgr->Update(diff, 0); // pussywizard: remove obsolete stuff before finding compatibility during map update
2390 }
2391
2392 {
2394 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update maps"));
2395 sMapMgr->Update(diff);
2396 }
2397
2398 if (sWorld->getBoolConfig(CONFIG_AUTOBROADCAST))
2399 {
2400 if (_timers[WUPDATE_AUTOBROADCAST].Passed())
2401 {
2402 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Send autobroadcast"));
2403 _timers[WUPDATE_AUTOBROADCAST].Reset();
2404 sAutobroadcastMgr->SendAutobroadcasts();
2405 }
2406 }
2407
2408 {
2409 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update battlegrounds"));
2410 sBattlegroundMgr->Update(diff);
2411 }
2412
2413 {
2414 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update outdoor pvp"));
2415 sOutdoorPvPMgr->Update(diff);
2416 }
2417
2418 {
2419 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update worldstate"));
2420 sWorldState->Update(diff);
2421 }
2422
2423 {
2424 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update battlefields"));
2425 sBattlefieldMgr->Update(diff);
2426 }
2427
2428 {
2429 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update LFG 2"));
2430 sLFGMgr->Update(diff, 2); // pussywizard: handle created proposals
2431 }
2432
2433 {
2434 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Process query callbacks"));
2435 // execute callbacks from sql queries that were queued recently
2436 ProcessQueryCallbacks();
2437 }
2438
2440 if (_timers[WUPDATE_UPTIME].Passed())
2441 {
2442 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update uptime"));
2443
2444 _timers[WUPDATE_UPTIME].Reset();
2445
2446 LoginDatabasePreparedStatement* stmt = LoginDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(LOGIN_UPD_UPTIME_PLAYERS);
2447 stmt->SetData(0, uint32(GameTime::GetUptime().count()));
2448 stmt->SetData(1, uint16(GetMaxPlayerCount()));
2449 stmt->SetData(2, realm.Id.Realm);
2450 stmt->SetData(3, uint32(GameTime::GetStartTime().count()));
2451 LoginDatabase.Execute(stmt);
2452 }
2453
2455 if (_timers[WUPDATE_CORPSES].Passed())
2456 {
2457 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Remove old corpses"));
2458 _timers[WUPDATE_CORPSES].Reset();
2459
2460 sMapMgr->DoForAllMaps([](Map* map)
2461 {
2462 map->RemoveOldCorpses();
2463 });
2464 }
2465
2467 if (_timers[WUPDATE_EVENTS].Passed())
2468 {
2469 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update game events"));
2470 _timers[WUPDATE_EVENTS].Reset(); // to give time for Update() to be processed
2471 uint32 nextGameEvent = sGameEventMgr->Update();
2472 _timers[WUPDATE_EVENTS].SetInterval(nextGameEvent);
2473 _timers[WUPDATE_EVENTS].Reset();
2474 }
2475
2477 if (_timers[WUPDATE_PINGDB].Passed())
2478 {
2479 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Ping MySQL"));
2480 _timers[WUPDATE_PINGDB].Reset();
2481 LOG_DEBUG("sql.driver", "Ping MySQL to keep connection alive");
2482 CharacterDatabase.KeepAlive();
2483 LoginDatabase.KeepAlive();
2484 WorldDatabase.KeepAlive();
2485 }
2486
2487 {
2488 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update instance reset times"));
2489 // update the instance reset times
2490 sInstanceSaveMgr->Update();
2491 }
2492
2493 {
2494 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Process cli commands"));
2495 // And last, but not least handle the issued cli commands
2496 ProcessCliCommands();
2497 }
2498
2499 {
2500 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update world scripts"));
2501 sScriptMgr->OnWorldUpdate(diff);
2502 }
2503
2504 {
2505 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update playersSaveScheduler"));
2506 playersSaveScheduler.Update(diff);
2507 }
2508
2509 {
2510 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update metrics"));
2511 // Stats logger update
2512 sMetric->Update();
2513 METRIC_VALUE("update_time_diff", diff);
2514 }
2515}

◆ UpdateSessions()

void World::UpdateSessions ( uint32  diff)
overridevirtual
  • Add new sessions
  • Then send an update signal to remaining ones
  • and remove not active sessions from the list

Implements IWorld.

2806{
2807 {
2808 METRIC_DETAILED_NO_THRESHOLD_TIMER("world_update_time",
2809 METRIC_TAG("type", "Add sessions"),
2810 METRIC_TAG("parent_type", "Update sessions"));
2811
2813 WorldSession* sess = nullptr;
2814 while (_addSessQueue.next(sess))
2815 {
2816 AddSession_(sess);
2817 }
2818 }
2819
2821 for (SessionMap::iterator itr = _sessions.begin(), next; itr != _sessions.end(); itr = next)
2822 {
2823 next = itr;
2824 ++next;
2825
2827 WorldSession* pSession = itr->second;
2828 WorldSessionFilter updater(pSession);
2829
2830 // pussywizard:
2831 if (pSession->HandleSocketClosed())
2832 {
2833 if (!RemoveQueuedPlayer(pSession) && getIntConfig(CONFIG_INTERVAL_DISCONNECT_TOLERANCE))
2834 _disconnects[pSession->GetAccountId()] = GameTime::GetGameTime().count();
2835 _sessions.erase(itr);
2836 // there should be no offline session if current one is logged onto a character
2837 SessionMap::iterator iter;
2838 if ((iter = _offlineSessions.find(pSession->GetAccountId())) != _offlineSessions.end())
2839 {
2840 WorldSession* tmp = iter->second;
2841 _offlineSessions.erase(iter);
2842 delete tmp;
2843 }
2844 pSession->SetOfflineTime(GameTime::GetGameTime().count());
2845 _offlineSessions[pSession->GetAccountId()] = pSession;
2846 continue;
2847 }
2848
2849 [[maybe_unused]] uint32 currentSessionId = itr->first;
2850 METRIC_DETAILED_TIMER("world_update_sessions_time", METRIC_TAG("account_id", std::to_string(currentSessionId)));
2851
2852 if (!pSession->Update(diff, updater))
2853 {
2854 if (!RemoveQueuedPlayer(pSession) && getIntConfig(CONFIG_INTERVAL_DISCONNECT_TOLERANCE))
2855 _disconnects[pSession->GetAccountId()] = GameTime::GetGameTime().count();
2856 _sessions.erase(itr);
2857 delete pSession;
2858 }
2859 }
2860
2861 // pussywizard:
2862 if (_offlineSessions.empty())
2863 return;
2864 uint32 currTime = GameTime::GetGameTime().count();
2865 for (SessionMap::iterator itr = _offlineSessions.begin(), next; itr != _offlineSessions.end(); itr = next)
2866 {
2867 next = itr;
2868 ++next;
2869 WorldSession* pSession = itr->second;
2870 if (!pSession->GetPlayer() || pSession->GetOfflineTime() + 60 < currTime || pSession->IsKicked())
2871 {
2872 _offlineSessions.erase(itr);
2873 delete pSession;
2874 }
2875 }
2876}
